explains: adv. 例行公事地，常规地；惯常地，毫不意外地

sentences.en: Visitors are routinely checked as they enter the building.
sentences.cn: 来访者在进入大楼时都要接受例行检查。

sentences.en: Mothers routinely lay babies on their backs to sleep.
sentences.cn: 母亲们通常会把婴儿平躺着放下睡觉。

sentences.en: Any outside criticism is routinely dismissed as interference.
sentences.cn: 任何外来批评照例都被当作干涉而不予理睬。
